data.name: 49th Parallel Café & Lucky’s Doughnuts

stores.hours: 8 a.m. – 6 p.m. Daily
stores.name: Main Street

stores.hours: 8 a.m. – 6 p.m. Daily
stores.name: 4th Ave

stores.hours: 8 a.m. - 5 p.m., Mon-Sat / 9 a.m. - 4 p.m., Sun
stores.name: Thurlow

data.description:
The idea was to keep it simple, and just make doughnuts the old fashioned way, no frozen product, nothing trucked in; just simple, delicious doughnuts and exceptional coffee. As a sub-brand of 49th Parallel Coffee Roasters, Lucky’s Doughnuts has delighted the Vancouver food scene with countless innovative and seasonal doughnut favourites.

Our culinary team is up early, rolling out the dough and prepping each component. Everything is made fresh, from scratch, no exceptions. With the same focus and commitment to quality and sourcing as our coffee program, you can taste the difference in a Lucky’s Doughnut.

data.name: A La Mode Pie Café

stores.hours: 11 a.m. to 4 pm. Daily, Closed Mondays in January
stores.name: Granville Island

data.description: Your most beloved pot pie spot, perfect for everyday meal and an eventful visit at Granville Island. With specialty gourmet pies like Blake Lively’s favourite Sweet Pies, or fan favourite Savory Pies. A La Mode has you covered with pairing the best beverage for your Pie meals, including carefully crafted, fun and innovative hot chocolate creations.

data.name: Aiyaohno Cafe

stores.hours: 8:00 a.m. to 4:30 p.m. Tues - Sat / Closed Sun - Mon
stores.name: Downtown

data.description: Aiyaohno Cafe is run by a husband and wife team inspired by the many countryside cafés they have stumbled across during their travels throughout Japan.  Aiyaohno Cafe serves matcha that they directly import from Kyoto and healthy vegetable focused cuisine with many vegan options and some local wild seafood.

data.name: Analog Coffee

stores.hours: 7 a.m. to 8 p.m., Mon – Fri, 8 a.m. to 8 p.m., Sat – Sun
stores.name: Downtown

data.description: Analog was founded with the view that every cup of coffee poured should be something special, and that ‘good enough’, is never good enough. Every detail of our guest experience is considered and pondered, from the décor, vibe and food, to the coffee itself. Our café, located in the heart of Yaletown, is a place where our community can gather and where we can share our coffee with everyone.

data.description:
For more than 20 years, Artigiano has taken pride in every single in-house product it creates. Proprietary unique blends produced at its own roaster in Burnaby, B.C., deliver a consistent and perfect cup of coffee – every time.
Artigiano is committed to social responsibility and sustainability by brewing the highest quality coffee in a way that positively impacts our local community, suppliers, team members and those who share it.
All locations are locally owned and operated, with a commitment to local and organic ingredients for all products, whenever possible.

data.name: AVIK & Gelato by James
data.description: AVIK, new to Vancouver, we believe in being part of a community based on family, love and goodness. Our first café welcomes you to our coffee, pastry and gelato all designed around quality and value. Multiple International Award winner, Maestro James, named in 2023 as Canada’s best gelato maker, trained in Italy, winner in Italy, brings his expertise and culinary talent along with his world class gelato.

stores.name: New West

data.description: Founded in April 2020, BAK’D Cookies is a brother and sister owned company that makes 5 oz gourmet cookies. BAK’D cookies are not like your typical cookies. They are BIG cookies, made locally, with high quality ingredients. Each cookie is freshly baked and handmade to guarantee that each bite is the perfect bite, every time.

data.name: Beaucoup Bakery and Café

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 5 p.m.
stores.name: Fir

stores.hours: 7 a.m. to 5 p.m., Mon - Fri / 8 a.m. to 5 p.m., Sat - Sun
stores.name: Dunsmuir

data.description: Beaucoup Bakery & Café creates exceptional French-inspired pastries and childhood favourites including sweet pastries, artistic cakes, seasonal tarts, nostalgic cookies and rich viennoiserie. The croissants have been cited as the city’s best in publications such as Vancouver Magazine. All sandwiches are made in-house and can be enjoyed ‘to-go’ or at a table in the charming 16-seat café. Beaucoup’s commitment to quality is never compromised and is evident in the 49th Parallel Coffee Roasters espresso and Bellocq tea they skillfully prepare and serve.

data.name: Bel Café

stores.hours: 7 a.m. to 5 p.m. Mon - Fri, 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. Sat - Sun
stores.name: Downtown

data.description:
David Hawksworth’s Bel Café combines expertly prepared food and beverages with efficient and friendly service in an inviting, vibrant and chic setting. A selection of ‘ready to go’ items feature fresh-baked pastries, gourmet sandwiches, salads, nourishing soups and delicate desserts.
Specialty coffees are custom-roasted locally and served by a team of highly trained baristas. Artisan teas and local lattes are also available.

data.name: Bella Gelateria

stores.hours: 11 a.m. to 10 p.m., Sun - Thurs / 11 a.m. to 10:30 p.m., Fri - Sat

stores.name: Burnaby

data.description: At Bella Gelateria, preserving the true artisanship of old-world handcrafted gelato is not only our passion but our goal. We do everything just like the way it was once made in Italy, by the best of the best, and have won countless awards and accolades for our unique and delicious gelato flavours. We believe in quality over quantity, so we make everything from scratch, using only the finest ingredients on the market. Our gelatos are made in small batches to ensure they are always fresh and packed full of flavour, leaving our guests with a unique and memorable experience.

stores.name: Downtown

data.description: We are passionate about Italian food and present an authentic, refined Italian experience. When you dine at any of the celebrated Bellaggio Cafe locations, you will be met with a seamless blend of old world charm and modern techniques.

data.description:
The bakery features 30+ flavours of bars to choose from, breakfast, lunch and drink offerings, and shelves of take home gifting items! Our concept is home-style baking with a sophisticated edge. We call it elevated nostalgic baking.
Everything fresh. Everything made in-house. Everything chock-full of butter and love!

data.name: Boba Run

stores.hours: 10 a.m. to 7 p.m., Mon - Sat / 11 a.m. to 6 p.m., Sun
stores.name: Downtown

data.description: Boba Run is Vancouver’s first Korean-inspired Boba tea shop! We’re all about serving creative and delicious drinks that are made with real wholesome ingredients. Come experience the fresh flavours of Boba Run! We can’t wait to serve you!

data.name: Boketto Dessert Café

stores.hours: 2 p.m. to 9 p.m., Tues – Thurs / 12 p.m. to 10 p.m., Fri – Sun / Closed Mon
stores.name: Fraser

data.description: At Boketto Dessert Café, we serve unique desserts that take you to different destinations, blending Asian influences with a creative twist. From our freshly made mini mochi waffles to handcrafted bubble teas and innovative soft-serve sundaes, each treat is crafted to bring joy and spark curiosity. Join us at Boketto, where every bite is a journey and each flavour tells a story.

data.name: BROYÉ CAFÉ & BAKERY

stores.hours: 9 a.m. to 7 p.m., Daily
stores.name: Fraserhood

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 6 p.m., Mon - Fri / Closed Sat - Sun
stores.name: Downtown

data.description: Broyé Cafe & Bakery brings a unique Japanese-Vietnamese fusion to Vancouver’s coffee scene, specializing in innovative drinks and pastries that blend East Asian flavours with Western favourites. As the first chain in Canada to serve Japanese and Vietnamese coffee together, we pride ourselves on crafting every drink with premium ingredients and authentic techniques, including our beloved moissants—a fusion of croissant and mochi textures. Since opening in 2021, our big family of customers and team members has celebrated these delicious cross-cultural experiences, making every visit a memorable one.

data.name: Bunny Cafe (The)

stores.hours: 1 p.m. to 7 p.m., Mon – Fri / 10 a.m. to 7 p.m., Sat – Sun
stores.name: Downtown

data.description: The Bunny Cafe, in partnership with Rabbitats Rescue Society, has created a therapeutic space to interact with adoptable bunnies, paving the way for a whole new concept of rabbit rescue, adoption, and advocacy. Reservations are recommended when visiting the bunny lounge, but drop ins are always welcome in the cafe!

data.name: Butter Baked Goods

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 5:30 p.m., Mon - Sat / 9:30 a.m. to 4:30 p.m., Sunday
stores.name: Mackenzie

data.description: Butter, as it is affectionately known to locals, has been serving up delicious baked goods since 2007. Located between Kerrisdale, Dunbar, and Mackenzie Heights at the corner of 33rd and Mackenzie Street, it’s a great spot to grab breakfast, lunch or one of the many yummy baked goods you remember from your childhood. Everything is made from scratch using only the best and most natural ingredients. The greatest care is taken and no detail overlooked to make sure that everything at Butter tastes as good as Mom would’ve made!

data.name: C Market Coffee

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 9 p.m.
stores.name: Port Coquitlam

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.
stores.name: Coquitlam

stores.hours: 7 a.m. to 9 p.m.
stores.name: Pitt Meadows

data.description:
At C Market Coffee, our mission is simple: to provide high-quality coffee and food in a fast-paced, casual setting. With 3 locations in Coquitlam, Port Coquitlam, and Pitt Meadows, they serve as a hub for growers, artisans, and families – we offer in-house roasted specialty coffee, a daily assortment of freshly baked pastries, beautifully crafted cakes, and delectable Asian-fusion cuisine.
C Market Coffee is an all-inclusive space where top-notch quality, artisan expertise, and exceptional service converge, creating meaningful moments for our guests and team. Whether it’s a leisurely Sunday brunch, afternoon coffee sip, or a quick “grab n go” meal, our diverse menu caters to all, dine-in, or take-out. Experience the charm of C Market Coffee, where our commitment to quality permeates every espresso shot, every sip, and every shared moment to spark a connection!

data.name: Cadeaux Bakery

stores.hours: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Tues - Sat / Closed Sun - Mon
stores.name: Downtown

data.description: Founded in 2012, Cadeaux Bakery is an artisan french bakery that has been serving the Gastown neighbourhood for over a decade. Here you’ll find us serving fresh made pastries, viennoiserie, cakes and desserts, ranging from classic and traditional flavours to creative and adventurous. Proudly a local small business in the greater Vancouver area, everything served is made in-house from scratch.

data.name: Caffe Super Veloce

stores.hours: 7 a.m. to 6 p.m., Mon – Fri / 9 a.m. to 3 p.m., Sat – Sun
stores.name: Downtown

data.description: Super Veloce is your one-stop shop for quick bites, lunch on the go, and coffee to keep you energized. We offer a selection of ready-to-go items, including fresh-pressed juices and protein-packed smoothies, as well as a variety of refreshing drinks and coffee.

data.name: Cannoli King

stores.hours: 9 a.m. to 6 p.m., Mon – Sat / 11 a.m. to 3 p.m., Sun
stores.name: Port Coquitlam

data.description: At Cannoli King in Port Coquitlam, experience the art of handcrafting exquisite cannoli available in many flavors. Our offerings extend beyond cannoli, encompassing a delectable array of cakes, cookies, pastries, and even corporate gifts. True to our commitment to quality, we meticulously create everything from scratch, from the doughs and fillings to the sponges and custards. Witness the craftsmanship as we cut, handroll, and deep-fry our cannoli shells in-house, ensuring a fresh and delightful experience as we fill them to order right before your eyes.

data.name: Casa Mia Neighbourhood Cucina & Mercato
data.description: Casa Mia is a restaurant-café-shop that captures the spirit of the Italian town square, where neighbours meet to catch up over espresso drinks and fresh-baked pastries, where ingredients for dinner are picked up on the way home, and where simple, delicious meals are enjoyed with family and friends.

data.name: Cassandra Cake Co.

stores.hours: 10 a.m. to 5 p.m., Tues - Fri / 10 a.m. to 4 p.m., Sat / 10 a.m. to 3 p.m., Sun
stores.name: Port Coquitlam

data.description: Cassandra Cake Co. is a custom bakery and cafe specializing in high tea, bespoke cakes and decadent desserts. From birthdays to weddings Cassandra Cake Co is here to bring your sweetest dreams to life. Our cafe offers a variety of specialty drinks, artisanal coffees and a delicious selection of lunch options, making every visit a treat.

data.name: Charisma Social Club House

stores.hours: 11 a.m. to 1 a.m., Thurs - Sun / 5 p.m. to 1 a.m., Mon - Wed
stores.name: Chinatown

data.description: Charisma Social Club House is a long-standing cafe in Chinatown, seriously serving housemade soups, award-winning cheesecakes, boutique bubble teas, and late-night comfort foods. While we specialize in unique flavour combinations, our extensive menu with customizable features is designed to cater to all preferences and encourage customers to create their own food adventure. Diligently family-run, we’re always open until 1 a.m. daily, and dedicated to providing a cozy, relaxed environment for customers in our spacious restaurant.

data.name: Chez Christophe Chocolaterie Patisserie

stores.hours: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Tues - Sat., Sunday and Monday, Closed.
stores.name: Burnaby

stores.hours: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Tues - Sat., Sunday and Monday, Closed
stores.name: White Rock

data.description:
In 2013, award-winning pastry chef, chocolatier, and Cacao Barry Ambassador Christophe Bonzon opened Chez Christophe Chocolaterie Patisserie with his wife Jess Bonzon in the bustling Burnaby Heights neighbourhood.
Bringing a bit of Swiss flair to Canada, their collection of fine handmade chocolates ranges from artistic chocolate sculptures, creative truffle flavours to signature chocolate bars, and seasonal favourites. Customers can also find an array of macarons, cakes, fine pastry and viennoiserie all of which are hand-made onsite and a full espresso-based coffee bar.
Due to overwhelming support, the pair opened their second location in White Rock, BC in November 2019. The product collection available at the new location remains the same as the Burnaby Flagship location.

data.name: Doughgirls Comfort Kitchen & Bakeshop

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 5 p.m., Daily
stores.name: UBC

data.description:
Inspired by a 1940s theme, the Doughgirls bring fresh, made-from-scratch food, artisan baking, and old time desserts to Wesbrook Village, UBC.
Timeless favourites like Mom’s chocolate cake, Shepherd’s Pie, Cornish Pasties, King Ranch Chicken, and Southern Buttermilk Biscuits will comfort the soul. You can eat in or take it to go. Our grab to go meals are prepared fresh, then frozen, so you can take and bake at your leisure (and create those incredible smells in your own kitchen).
According to Rose and Thuy, the Doughgirls themselves, it’s "Down home done right".

stores.name: Coquitlam

data.description: Doughnut Love is a gourmet doughnut and coffee shop serving the Tri-Cities.  Our doughnuts are hand crafted made from scratch, fresh throughout the day using fresh local ingredients!  With a menu that changes monthly, there is always something new to try!

data.description: At Drunken Chocolatier, our philosophy is to support the local liquor and farmers market communities and bring their products to people in chocolate form. We love working with and keeping up with everyone in the local community around us, and try to keep everything fresh and fun by pulling our flavours from what’s available locally and seasonally!

stores.name: 5th Ave

data.description: For over 20 years, Elysian Coffee Roasters has been independently owned and a beloved destination where everyone can feel authentically themselves. We take pride in roasting our own coffee, and this commitment to quality extends to our house-made pastries, syrups, and toppings—using only butter, olive oil, and coconut oil, free of industrial seed oils. Our goal is to provide a simple, delicious, and approachable experience—so all you need to do is enjoy.

data.name: Eternal Abundance

stores.hours: 10 a.m. to 6 p.m., Mon / 10 a.m. to 7 p.m., Tues - Sun
stores.name: Commercial Drive

data.description: Eternal Abundance is an all organic, vegan market & eatery on Commercial Drive. We are a community oriented store that strives to inspire a commitment to sustainable and compassionate living, through supporting organic farming practices and vegan values. We offer a welcoming space that allows customers to explore healthy, conscious consumption through our nourishing eatery menu, as well as our market which stocks a variety of top quality organic produce, superfoods, spices, staple and specialty items. We seek out direct purchasing relationships with local farmers and artisan producers and aim to be as low-waste as possible through efforts like our compostable packaging and jar return program. Come and enjoy healthy plant-based living with us!

stores.name: Yaletown

data.description:
Faubourg Bakery is a renowned French bakery, pâtisserie and café.
Feel like you have been transported to la belle France with a selection of our fresh baked viennoiseries, breads, pastries and macarons.  Enjoy it with our delicious house blend coffee or any choice of our handcrafted drinks.
We also offer a delicious selection of gourmet cakes which will make a show stopping centerpiece for any occasion.

data.name: Federal Store (The)

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 6 p.m, Daily
stores.name: Mount Pleasant

data.description: The Federal Store is a luncheonette and neighbourhood grocer. We are best known for our in-house baking and buttercream cakes, as well as our from-scratch breakfast and lunch cafe offerings. We are lucky to be part of such a great community and our prepared drinks and grocery items are selected to highlight other local small businesses that we love.

data.name: Fife Bakery

stores.hours: 9 a.m. to 5 p.m., Mon - Sat, 11 a.m. to 5 p.m., Sunday
stores.name: Mount Pleasant

data.description: An artisan bread and coffee spot, opened in December of 2016. Located just outside Olympic Village, in the heart of East Side Vancouver industrial, the bakery is focused on sourcing delicious and sustainable food ingredients. A serious but playful team bakes up loaves of levain bread and pours every cup of specialty-graded coffee.

data.name: Fufú Café

stores.hours: 10 a.m. to 6 p.m., Tues - Sun
stores.name: Fraserview

data.description:
Fufú Cafe is the spot for the newest stack snack of choice – Japanese Soufflé Pancakes. 
A best-of-both-worlds blend of the classic French dessert and the American breakfast favourite, Japanese Soufflé Pancakes are the newest hot culinary trend, and Fufú is pleased to be the first café in Vancouver to exclusively feature the light and airy delicacies. Known for their incredibly fluffy consistency and wobbly, whimsical appearance, Japanese Souffle Pancakes are a true melt-in-your-mouth treat. As Instagramable as they are delicious.

data.name: Gem Chocolates

stores.hours: 11:30 a.m. to 6 p.m., Mon - Sat, Closed Sunday.
stores.name: Kerrisdale

data.description: Gem Chocolates is all about handmaking amazing, artisan chocolates using only the highest quality, natural ingredients with absolutely ZERO preservatives or chemical additives.  We are also very keen about creating and providing real career opportunities to people in the neurodivergent community where they can learn and develop new skills and contribute in their unique ways.  We appreciate all the Gems we get to work with: our awesome team members, our wonderful customers, and our amazing suppliers!

data.name: Glenburn Soda Fountain

stores.hours: 6 p.m. to 9 p.m., Tues-Thurs / 6 p.m. to 10 p.m., Fri / 3 p.m. to 10 p.m., Sat / 3 p.m. to 9 p.m., Sunday. Closed Monday.
stores.name: Burnaby

data.description: A sweet taste of history in The Heights of Burnaby awaits you at Glenburn Soda Fountain. Featuring premium ice cream from Birchwood Dairy, milk and cream from Meadowfresh Dairy, and fruit and berries from local farms, all treats are hand-crafted and made with traditional methods. Milkshakes, malts, classic sundaes, and sodas will bring you back to a time when the soda fountain was the local hot spot.

data.name: GOOD Chocolatier (The)

stores.hours: 1 p.m. to 7 p.m., Wed - Fri / 10 a.m. to 4 p.m., Sat - Sun
stores.name: Greens Market

data.description: We LOVE our cacao – we use exclusively organic, single-origin cacao from Ecuador, while supporting farmers in producing countries. Our goal is to keep our chocolate clean so that the GOOD in our cacao remains GOOD in your body! With simple yet sophisticated ingredients and a world-class manufacturing process, we create an irresistible and healthy chocolate for you! No soy, no gluten, and no refined sugars! Truly a guilt -free pleasure with positive impact. Did you know we are an inclusive employer? Visit us and learn more!

data.name: Guffo Café

stores.hours: Festival drinks are offered from noon until closing each day. 7 a.m. to 5:30 p.m., Mon - Fri / 7:30 a.m. to 5:30 p.m., Sat - Sun
stores.name: Downtown

data.description: Located in the heart of downtown Vancouver, Guffo Cafe is a vibrant space where coffee pros craft exceptional drinks and unforgettable experiences. This year, we’re thrilled to bring a magical creation to the Hot Chocolate Festival, showcasing our passion for creativity and bold flavours. At Guffo, we celebrate great coffee, community, and the stories behind every cup, making it a true second home for all who visit.

data.name: Honolulu Coffee

stores.hours: 7:30 a.m. to 6 p.m., Mon - Thurs / 7:30 a.m. to 7 p.m., Fri - Sun
stores.name: Nelson

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 6 p.m., Mon - Thurs / 8 a.m. to 7 p.m., Fri - Sun
stores.name: Kerrisdale

stores.hours: 7:30 a.m. to 6 p.m., daily
stores.name: False Creek

data.description:
In Hawaiian, ohana means “family”, and Honolulu Coffee has been a proud member of Vancouver’s ohana of locally owned bakeries and coffee shops since we brought our signature brand of aloha spirit to the city in 2016.
We are dedicated to bringing an authentic Hawaiian coffee experience and laid back island atmosphere to our many friends and guests at our two cafes in downtown Vancouver and Kerrisdale and are firmly committed to supporting sustainability and the communities that we are proud to call home.
"Farm-to-cup" is the core philosophy around which we have built our brand, and ‘local’ drives everything that we do. We are constantly adjusting our menus and recipes to showcase nearby suppliers and ingredients, and collaborate with our fellow businesses whenever possible to show our support for the local community. To that same end, we also strive to empower our team members at every turn and encourage them to keep developing their skills on both a professional and personal level.
It is an honour to be counted among the many talented cafes and baristas that are taking part in this annual festival, and we look forward to showing off our aloha spirit in every sip!

data.name: Kafka’s Coffee, Great Northern Way

stores.hours: 7:30 a.m. to 5 p.m., Mon - Fri / 8 a.m. to 5 p.m., Sat - Sun
stores.name: Great Northern Way

data.description: Kafka’s Coffee opened its first cafe on Main Street in 2010 and hasn’t looked back since. Our immense love for coffee led us to create a place for others to enjoy high-quality, brewed coffee and fresh baked goods in a supportive, community space.

data.description: Vancouver’s finest real fruit ice cream, frozen yogurt, plant-based swirls, decadent scoops, and a tasty curation of locally made sweets and treats! Also serving sumptuous hot chocolates, teas by Organic Origins and espresso drinks made with 49th Parallel Coffee.

data.name: Koko Monk Hot Chocolate Lounge

stores.hours: Noon - 8 p.m., Tues-Sun, Closed Monday.
stores.name: West Broadway

data.description:
KoKo Monk Chocolates: raw, organic, vegan, bean-to-bar boutique chocolates and macarons. Since October 2018, the company serves their guests and friends.
Internationally known and recognized as among the “top 20 chocolate companies in the world” for their chocolate drinks by Buzzfeed, Koko Monk’s one-of-a-kind, complex and sophisticated flavour fusions are created using organic, health-based ingredients of raw origin beans and natural sweeteners. Making their contemporary, beautiful creations not only delicious, but part of the health food category in Vancouver.
Vegan as well as sugar-free options are also available.

data.description:
L’ Atelier is an Artisan French bakery with a southern France inspired cafe , our daily production is hand crafted by our team.
We are proud to serve traditional pastries and breads , along with a trendy modern menu and specialities . Our professional chef also makes all our drinks ingredients to create seasonal recipes . Quality means that everyone can enjoy authentic French pastries and well balanced drinks surrounded by a European atmosphere.

data.description: Mercato di Luigi is a quaint Italian grocer and cafe. We carry a range of Italian products, pantry staples, fresh pasta, and housemade sauces. In addition, we serve your favourite espresso-based drinks, pastries, made-to-order sandwiches and daily pasta lunches (available at 12th and Carolina only). Join us for a homey escape to Italy, and take some of it home with you too.

data.description: The Modern Pantry is your new favourite, made-from-scratch, neighbourhood bakery in Ambleside, West Vancouver. We believe good, real food is the jumping off point for all of life’s adventures and connections. Join us for your morning coffee, a casual lunch, glass of wine, or a quick hello while you pick up freshly baked sourdough bread, treats, or any of our house-made provisions.

data.description: Authentic coffee roasters. Our hyper seasonal menu is based off tight relationships and fine tuned perennial roast profiles to get you perfectly light, balanced, versatile coffees at their peak.

data.name: Mon Paris Patisserie

stores.hours: 9 a.m. to 6 p.m., Tues - Sun, Closed Monday.
stores.name: Burnaby

data.description:
Chef Elena Krasnova was born in Russia and grew up during the “Perestroika” era when bare necessities were in great demand. It was at  this time of her young life that she first began to express herself through artistic means, developing an ability to create ‘something from nothing’.
Later, while still in her early twenties, Elena came to Vancouver where she attended university and earned several degrees prior to moving to France to pursue her passion for making pastry. It was during her studies at the famed Ferrandie Ecole de Gastronomie in Paris that Elena found her true calling.
Back again in Canada, Chef Elena opened Mon Paris Patisserie early in 2017. Here in her 11,000 sq foot studio and cafe in Burnaby, she now showcases her exquisite line of pastries, chocolates and desserts.

data.name: Nelson the Seagull Cafe

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 4 p.m., Daily
stores.name: Gastown

data.description: Nelson the Seagull Bakery & Cafe is nestled in the vibrant and historic neighbourhood of Gastown. Since 2011 this family-run business has specialized in sourdough bread, brunch and coffee. Located in one of Vancouver’s oldest heritage buildings, this spot is a brunch/lunch oasis for everyone and anyone. While you’re there, look around carefully and you might just spot the owners’ South African heritage sprinkled throughout.

data.name: NUTTEA

stores.hours: 12 p.m. to 7:30 p.m., Tues - Thurs / 12 p.m. to 8 p.m., Fri / 11 a.m. to 8 p.m., Sat / 11 a.m. to 7 p.m., Sun
stores.name: 4th Ave

data.description:
NUTTEA is committed to producing the best quality Nut Mylk.
We insist on making our Nut Mylk fresh daily with good quality nuts and natural ingredients only.
The featured-five nuts are baked and cold-pressed into our Nut Mylk, which is not only beneficial to human health but also creates a rich flavor, making it better choice in your drinks.

data.name: Patina Brewing Co. Brew House & BBQ

stores.hours: 12 p.m. to 8 p.m., Sun - Tues / 12 p.m. to 9 p.m., Weds - Thurs / 12 p.m. to 10 p.m., Fri - Sat
stores.name: Port Coquitlam

data.description: Welcome to Patina Brewing Co., a multi-award-winning gathering spot where every sip and bite tells a story of passion and community spirit! Nestled in the welcoming arms of Port Coquitlam, we’re more than just a brewery – we’re a home for those who cherish exceptional craft beer, mouth-watering Southern BBQ, and the warmth of good company. Our team pours our hearts into creating a place where delectable flavours meet a commitment to community and sustainability. Join us in our journey of culinary excellence, where each glass raised is a celebration of togetherness, and every plate served is a testament to our dedication to quality and community. Come, be a part of our story and discover why Patina is not just a brewery, but a destination where memories are made and cherished.

data.name: PAUL Bakery, Café and Restaurant

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 10 p.m., Mon - Thurs / 8 a.m. to 11 p.m., Fri - Sat / 8 a.m. to 10 p.m., Sun
stores.name: Robson

data.description:
PAUL is a French family-owned company built upon a foundation of over 130 years of time-honoured production methods passed down for five generations.
With numerous locations internationally, PAUL launched into the Canadian market with the opening of its first Canadian location in Vancouver, British Columbia. The new bakery, restaurant and cafe concept opened April 2021, with the plan to develop many more stores in the Canadian market, so that all Canadian consumers could enjoy and immerse themselves in the French Art de Vivre!

data.name: PAUL Le Café

stores.hours: 7 a.m. to 5 p.m., Mon - Fri / Closed Sat - Sun
stores.name: Seymour

data.description: As well as being a well-renowned bakery, our inaugural PAUL location was also a distinguished Tea and Coffee Room. PAUL le Café pays tribute to this original Maison de Qualité. Experience the inviting charm of our latest establishment, Paul Le Café, where Art Déco style meets the French tradition of pairing coffee & tea with an exquisite selection of house-made viennoiseries, sandwiches, pastries, and other artisanal beverages, including fresh juices and smoothies. Whether you’re looking for a quick lunch or a moment of respite, we are here to serve you.

data.description: Peaked Pies brings the taste of Australia with handcrafted savory pies, made fresh daily with locally sourced ingredients. Known for their flaky pastry and unique fillings, they offer options ranging from classic meat to vegan and sweet pies. Pair your pie with an authentic Australian-style espresso coffee for the ultimate Down Under-inspired experience.

stores.name: Vancouver

stores.name: Burnaby

stores.hours: 9 a.m. to 8 p.m., Sun - Thu, 9 a.m. to 9 p.m., Fri - Sat
stores.name: Langley

data.description:
Since 2011 The Pie Hole has been stuffing your pie hole with their delicious pies. The Pie Hole offers different flavours exploring both sweet and savoury creations using our famous ‘Double Butter Crust’.
Our shop has been featured on the wildly popular Food Network television series, Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives where host Guy Fieri exclaimed, “Having 100+ recipes, and what people get in the experience, I don’t know where your ceiling is!”
We have published an acclaimed cookbook, You Wanna Piece of Me?, that was shortlisted for the Canada Taste Awards and is frequently a number one best seller on Amazon.

data.description: Purebread is a bakery known for its indulgent treats, warm atmosphere, and jaw-dropping displays brimming with handcrafted baked goods. Rooted in its Whistler origins, it embodies the spirit of adventure, offering the perfect balance of indulgence and fuel for life’s adventures. From buttery scones and decadent brownies to savoury pastries and whoopies bursting with flavour, each item is crafted fresh, with quality and joy baked into every bite. Whether it’s a post-run meet-up or a cozy celebration, Purebread is on a mission to spread happiness and inspire life’s sweetest moments, one delicious treat at a time.

stores.name: Beach Ave

data.description: Tartine Bread & Pies is a locally operated bakery & cafe located in the heart of Downtown Vancouver. Known for its artisanal approach, the bakery specializes in hand-crafted breads, pies, sandwiches and other baked goods made with high-quality, locally sourced ingredients. The café has become a community favourite, offering both delicious pastries and a cozy, welcoming atmosphere for locals and visitors alike. With a focus on traditional baking techniques, Tartine has built a strong reputation in Vancouver’s thriving food scene.

data.description: Temper Pastry is a family-owned chocolate and pastry shop in West Vancouver, dedicated to creating handcrafted, artisanal treats. Every pastry, chocolate and dessert is made on-site with the finest ingredients, reflecting our commitment to quality and craftsmanship. We pride ourselves on being a community-focused business, offering delicious, locally made confections for all to enjoy!

data.description: "More than 15 years ago, my wife Lisa and I began the journey to realize our lifelong dream: to be creative, have fun, make people laugh and, of course, prepare the most delectable handcrafted chocolates and pastries imaginable. Step by step, we continue to strive for perfection driven by our love and passion for food and people." – Thomas Haas

data.name: To Live For Bakery & Cafe

stores.hours: 7 a.m. to 5 p.m., Daily
stores.name: East Vancouver

data.description: To Live For Bakery is an independent, purpose-driven bakery on a mission to prove that the future of baking is plant-based. Flaky croissants, cakes, cookies, loaves, espresso and so much more are available daily at their East Van brick-and-mortar cafe that opened in November of 2022. Established in 2011 as a wholesale bakery, they transitioned away from animal ingredients a few years into their journey after learning what happens to animals in the dairy and egg industries. Through trial and error, they believe the few ingredient swaps they’ve made have led to even more delicious products.

data.name: Union Market

stores.hours: 8 a.m. to 5 p.m., Daily
stores.name: Chinatown

data.description: Union Market is a vibrant community hub nestled in one of Vancouver’s oldest neighbourhoods, thoughtfully reimagined to honour its storied past while embracing fresh, modern ideas. Operated by a passionate team of Strathcona and East Vancouver locals, it provides a welcoming space to savour freshly baked goods, artisan bread, locally sourced essentials, and exceptional coffee. With a deep commitment to fostering community connections and promoting a mindful pace of life, Union Market remains a cherished cornerstone of the neighbourhood.

data.description: There is a place where Old World Artistry meets Urban Social — a place where old school tradition embraces contemporary culinary genius. Uno Gelato is a place where playful, unexpected epicurean adventures are consummated every day. Uno Gelato is a luxurious playground for the senses where all you need to bring (other than a BFF) is an unquenchable obsession to explore, celebrate…and return

data.name: Uprising Breads Bakery

stores.hours: 7 a.m. to 6 p.m., Daily
stores.name: Venables

data.description:
Uprising Breads Bakery Café is a familiar destination and a favourite meeting spot in the vibrant Commercial Drive neighbourhood of East Vancouver. We bake everything on site, early every morning. We offer that full selection of familiar home baking that will make you want, "one of everything please!"
Our bright and cheerful, comfy-cozy café provides indoor and outdoor seating with a full coffee service. Lunchtime offerings include homemade soups and salads, hot savoury items and a variety of sandwiches, made on our own fresh baked breads.
Like the locals say: "Meet you at the Uprising!"

data.name: Vancouver Aquarium

stores.hours: 10 a.m. to 4 p.m., Daily
stores.name: Aquurium

data.description: Since opening in 1956, the Vancouver Aquarium has connected more than 40 million people from around the world to our oceans and inspired them to take action to address key threats. Located in Stanley Park, the Vancouver Aquarium is home to hundreds of incredible species. The Vancouver Aquarium is a fully accredited member of Association of Zoos and Aquariums (AZA), Alliance of Marine Mammal Parks and Aquariums (AMMPA), Canada’s Accredited Zoos and Aquariums (CAZA), and Humane Conservation Certified by American Humane.

stores.name: Kitsilano

data.description:
VIVA is a local café & bakery that has been proudly serving the Kitsilano community since 2002. 
Best known for great coffee and incredible pastries. Everything is made in house and baked fresh every morning. They source ingredients locally whenever possible and enjoy supporting local businesses. Find the classics in store daily or visit on the weekend for something new and seasonal.

data.description: There’s more to our name than just ice cream, we continue the tradition of Lower Lonsdale’s original ice cream parlour and candy store. The Welcome Parlour has been part of North Vancouver’s community since 1909. Today Welcome Parlour Ice Cream is located at The Shipyards in North Vancouver. Scooping Ice Cream every day.

data.description: Opened in 2020, Whisk Matcha Cafe x Level V Bakery is a female-owned & operated, plant-based matcha cafe & bakery located in the heart of Mount Pleasant neighborhood. They specialize in plant-based, high quality drinks & baked goods while offering some of the most creative and Asian-inspired yummy goodies!
